text: Tamil Eelam is a proposed state for Tamils in Sri Lanka. It was one of the reasons for the Sri Lankan Civil War. The main leader was Velupillai Prabhakaran, the leader of the Tamil Tigers. Tamils number just over 11 percent of the Sri Lankan population. They live mostly in the coastal regions of north, east and west Sri Lanka. The dominant Sinhalese people are just under 75% of the population. ==Related pages== * Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam ==Other websites== *Articles about Tamil Eelam at Times of India Category:National liberation movements Category:Tamils Category:Sri Lankan Civil War Category:Politics of Sri Lanka
title: Tamil Eelam
